import dataiku
from dataiku.scenario import Trigger
t = Trigger()

dataset = dataiku.Dataset("card_info_filtered")
metrics = dataset.get_last_metric_values()

# metric_ids = metrics.get_all_ids() # list the ids of the metrics for this dataset

check_records = metrics.get_metric_by_id('check:CHECK:number_of_records')
check_status  = check_records["lastValues"][0]['value']
if check_status=="OK": # your condition here
    t.fire()
